My First Blog Post

Welcome to the blog! This is a sample blog post to show you how it works.

Getting Started

You can write your blog posts in Markdown, which makes it easy to format your content.

Features

  • Write in Markdown
  • Simple and clean
  • Easy to maintain

Just create a new .md file in the content/blog directory and run the build script!
